thread.title: Free -- Car Rental Upgrades from Alamo
thread.title_full: Free -- Car Rental Upgrades from Alamo

title: Free -- Car Rental Upgrades from Alamo
text:
Home > Car Rental Deals > Free -- Car Rental Upgrades from Alamo Free -- Car Rental Upgrades from Alamo   - October 1, 2015 at 1:57 PM Tweet 
Alamo is offering a complimentary class upgrade on car rentals now through January 14, 2016. This offer is valid on compact through mid-size vehicles rented in the United States and Canada. 
How to get this deal: Visit Alamo 's site; pick up the vehicle by January 14, 2016; and book by December 31, 2015. 
The fine print: The promotion is applicable to compact through mid-size vehicles. A 24-hour advance reservation is required, and the promotion may not be combined with another discount (with the exception of member discounts). Blackout dates may apply. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
